parameters.name: Account
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID to grant access to.

parameters.name: VpcIds
parameters.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant access to. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Grantor
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the cluster owner.

nested_items.name: Grantee
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the grantee of the cluster.

nested_items.name: AuthorizeTime
nested_items.description: The time (UTC) when the authorization was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the authorization action.

nested_items.name: AllowedAllVPCs
nested_items.description: Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.

nested_items.name: AllowedVPCs
nested_items.description: The VPCs allowed access to the cluster.

nested_items.name: EndpointCount
nested_items.description: The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.
